title: LibGuides: Complementary & Alternative Medicine: Homeopathy
author: Courtney Mlinar
description: Web sites and resources for information about approaches to medical treatment or therapy not usually taken by conventional Western medicine.
cleaned_text: Homeopaths](https://homeopathy.org/) Welcome to the NASH library. Most of our resources are free and for public use.... Review the most up to date clinical trials, science data and government reports on homeopathy. Use the links directory to access even more information on advocacy, certification and other homeopathic resources. Purchase back issues of the American Homeopath in digital or paper form.
